mapper.insert: insert into iot.meter (meterName, meterDesc, createDate) values (#{meterName}, #{meterDesc}, date_format(#{createDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
mapper.select: select * from iot.meter order by createDate desc
mapper.update: create table if not exists iot.mid ( `mid` varchar(64) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `meterName` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `meterDesc` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`mid`), UNIQUE KEY `mid` (`mid`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
